name: Full Throttle Demolition Derby
description:
Full Throttle Demolition Derby is a fun, thrilling, action, multiplayer, car party game, where you must do what you can to destroy the competition. Whether it be ramming them into the wall at full speed, squashing them with a giant hammer, pushing them into dangerous traps, or blowing them up with a laser beam attached to the roof of your car, the possibilities are limited only by your imagination.

FTDD, is our (Desert Beagle) first major project made which was shown at Melbourne PAX in 2018.

Current build is not final, is subject to change from feedback.
